data.oai_dc:dc: Fig 3A.xls provides the raw data used in Figure 3 A. Data are presented into three excel sheets: "PintegrifoliaPuertoViejo", "hybridsPuerto Viejo" and "NightPuerto Viejo". All data were obtained in Puerto Viejo, Uruguay. These data sheets show the number of visitations of "small bees", "big bees", "butterflies" and other insects on P. integrifolia and F1 hybrids in Puerto Viejo.
